failRules.description: Participant must pass 4/5 steps on practice shape trials. Only 1 (FailThreshold) incorrect response is allowed.
Participant must pass 4/5 steps on practice color trials. Only 1 (FailThreshold) incorrect response is allowed.

steps.text: This is a matching activity with shapes and colors. You will be asked to tap the pictures on the screen.
steps.title: Matching Activity
SHAPE Matching Activity
steps.text: You will be asked to tap the box with the same SHAPE as the picture in the middle of the screen.

steps.title: Now let's practice.
steps.text:
You will see the word SHAPE to remind you to tap the picture that is the same SHAPE as the picture in the middle of the screen.
 
Answer as fast as you can. If you make a mistake, just keep going.

feedback.correctFeedback: That's right! These are the same shape
feedback.incorrectFeedback: These are not the same shape

feedback.correctFeedback: That's right! These are the same shape
feedback.incorrectFeedback: These are not the same shape

feedback.correctFeedback: That's right! These are the same shape
feedback.incorrectFeedback: These are not the same shape

feedback.correctFeedback: That's right! These are the same shape
feedback.incorrectFeedback: These are not the same shape

feedback.correctFeedback: That's right! These are the same shape
feedback.incorrectFeedback: These are not the same shape

steps.text:
Now you will match by COLOR. 
 You will be asked to tap the box with the same COLOR as the picture in the middle of the screen.
steps.title: COLOR Matching Activity

steps.text:
You will see the word COLOR to remind you to tap the picture that is the same COLOR as the picture in the middle of this screen. 
 Answer as fast as you can. If you make a mistake, just keep going.
steps.title: Now let's practice.

feedback.correctFeedback: That's right! These are the same color
feedback.incorrectFeedback: These are not the same color

feedback.correctFeedback: That's right! These are the same color
feedback.incorrectFeedback: These are not the same color

feedback.correctFeedback: That's right! These are the same color
feedback.incorrectFeedback: These are not the same color

feedback.correctFeedback: That's right! These are the same color
feedback.incorrectFeedback: These are not the same color

feedback.correctFeedback: That's right! These are the same color
feedback.incorrectFeedback: These are not the same color

steps.text:
When you see the word SHAPE, tap the picture that is the same SHAPE. 
 
 When you see the word COLOR, tap the picture that is the same COLOR. 
 
Answer as fast as you can. If you make a mistake, just keep going.
steps.title: Now let's try both activities together.

feedback.correctFeedback: That's right! These are the same color
feedback.incorrectFeedback: These are not the same color

feedback.correctFeedback: That's right! These are the same shape
feedback.incorrectFeedback: These are not the same shape

feedback.correctFeedback: That's right! These are the same shape
feedback.incorrectFeedback: These are not the same shape

feedback.correctFeedback: That's right! These are the same color
feedback.incorrectFeedback: These are not the same color

feedback.correctFeedback: That's right! These are the same shape
feedback.incorrectFeedback: These are not the same shape

steps.text:
When you see the word SHAPE, tap the picture that is the same SHAPE. 
 When you see the word COLOR, tap the picture that is the same COLOR. 
 Go as fast as you can without making mistakes.
steps.title: Now let's do some more!

steps.text: You completed this task. Tap Next to continue.
steps.title: Good job!
